name: Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
biography: A Harvard-trained chemist who specialized in pigments, Charles worked for the textile industry. When his brother, the painter Winslow Homer, died, Charles donated a large collection of his brother’s work to the Cooper Union.
biography_75_words: A Harvard-trained chemist who specialized in pigments, Charles worked for the textile industry. When his brother, the painter Winslow Homer, died, Charles donated a large collection of his brother’s work to the Cooper Union.
biography_50_characters: A chemist who worked for the textile industry
